articles.author: Joshua Posaner
articles.title: Zelenskyy offers Trump a tour of Ukraine's frontline - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Ukrainian president called for more arms and ammunition to help even the odds against Russia.
articles.content: "This is Russia's war against any rules at all," Zelenskyy said, to applause from the auditorium, adding:" If you do not manage to act now, Putin will make the next years catastrophic for other count… [+969 chars]
